holisticai.utils.extract_group_vectors¶

holisticai.utils.extract_group_vectors(p_attr, groups)¶

Extract Group Vectors

Description

This function returns a list of group membership vectors (one for each group).

Parameters

p_attrarray-like

Protected attribute vector

groupslist of str

Group names

Returns

list of membership vectors
